description:
Our Client:

Latteria Soresina was founded in 1900 in Italy as a cooperative for processing the milk produced by its members and in response to the pressing need to forge a solid union between farmers and milk producers.

Currently, there are around 200 members represented by the farms producing the milk processed by Latteria Soresina

The company boasts a wide range of dairy products of high sensory quality with focus in PDO Italian Cheeses, including a service component able to meet the needs of all its customers all around the world.

Today, Latteria Soresina is the world’s first producer of the famous Grana Padano and holds pole positions for other Italian excellences, such as Parmigiano Reggiano, butter and Provolone cheese, having long been established as a prestigious brand within its sector. This is a guarantee for all those who choose their products.

Latteria Soresina USA serves customer in North America, being responsible for the commercialization of the products portfolio offering to American consumers authentic and all-natural Italian products under an historical Italian brand.

The candidate

We are recruiting for Latteria Soresina a National Sales Manager. If you have at least ten years of experience selling fresh and packaged food to retailers in dairy business; if you are energetic, dedicated, and self-motivated, this position could be a great step up in your career! The new National Sales Manager will be based initially at home-office and will develop relationships with existing and new clients. This position requires at least 25% traveling national-wide.

Your skills and background:

• Experience managing a large territory, selling both direct and through distribution.

• At least 10 years of experience in selling perishable food/deli products directly to grocery store chains or through brokers (Dairy)

• Network of grocery buyers for Dairy category

• Deep knowledge of the purchasing process for grocery store chains (high-end and mainstream).

• Excellent communications and organizational skills.

• Assertiveness and proactivity are essential for the role.

• Experience in overseeing the marketing and social media activities as a creative tool to stay in touch with clients, promote the brand and develop the business.

The role and the responsibilities:

The National Sales Manager will be responsible for the sales activities in the assigned territory. This position will report directly to the Soresina Group VP of Sales and will interact with other members in the sales team while working closely with the operations team.

• Leads sales growth, profitability, strategy and execution for the assigned accounts or/and territory

• Cooperate with the local commercial partner to expand the business with current customer base

• Build distribution and drive sales in grocery with a new line of packaged range designed for the US market.

• Developing key growth sales strategies, tactics and action plans for Retail

• Leads the execution of all customer agreements/programs through strong teamwork and communication with customers, ddistributors and brokers/partners.

• Sets up product presentations, set-up promotional trade shows.

• Reviews sales statistics with management to determine customer needs and help to develop sales campaigns to accommodate goals of company.

• Coordinates, attends and manages all aspects of trade shows.

• Maintain clear communication with Italian Headquarter

• Responsible for maintaining CRM within customer base and new sales prospects.

Salary range: $110k-$150k with $20k/$25k bonus as MBO
